attributes.action: provide 'free' health and social care for older people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The North East Pensioners Association are calling for the government to put an end to older people having to sell their homes to pay for care in later life when they have contributed via national insurance and income tax all of their lives

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to 
"provide 'free' health and social care for older people."


The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11278.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/nepensioners/
